title: Indian Oil re-issues tender seeking LNG cargo for Oct -sources
text:
Indian Oil re-issues tender seeking LNG cargo for Oct -sources

Commodities 32 minutes ago (Sep 05, 2019 15:31)

© Reuters. Indian Oil re-issues tender seeking LNG cargo for Oct -sources SINGAPORE, Sept 5 (Reuters) - Indian Oil Corp has re-issued a tender seeking liquefied (LNG) for delivery in October, two industry sources said on Thursday. The tender closes on Sept. 5, with same-day validity. The company had issued a tender in late August seeking a cargo for delivery into Dahej on Oct. 5, but did not award it for reasons which were not immediately clear, the sources said.

Indian Oil re-issues tender seeking LNG cargo for Oct -sources
description: Indian Oil re-issues tender seeking LNG cargo for Oct -sources
